text:
[Verse]
Sun sets on the city
Heartbeat's never steady
Lost in flashing lights
Chasing endless nights

[Verse 2]
Feet move to the rhythm
Crowds go wild in unison
Feel the music rise
See the sparks fly high

[Chorus]
Lost in the moment
Feel it in the air
Lost in the moment
Living without a care

[Verse 3]
Hands up to the ceiling
Vibes so unreal and healing
Dancing through the haze
Lost in magic's maze

[Chorus]
Lost in the moment
Feel it in the air
Lost in the moment
Living without a care

[Bridge]
Stars shine above us
Dreams rush inside us
Hearts beating fast
Making this night last
title: Lost in the Moment
